sections.heading: workweek; state institutions; hours required
sections.text: All heads of institutions and their deputies, assistants, and employees, except part-time employees, shall render not less than forty hours of labor each week.SourceLaws 1957, c. 398, ยง 2, p. 1364.

84-1002.Basic workweek; state institutions; hours required.

All heads of institutions and their deputies, assistants, and employees, except part-time employees, shall render not less than forty hours of labor each week.

SourceLaws 1957, c. 398, ยง 2, p. 1364.
